channel.title: smart watch on a neuro[log]
channel.description: Recent content in smart watch on a neuro[log]

item.title: Getting Up
item.description: Getting up and walking around and doing things is good for you. I bought an Apple Watch several months ago. It’s my first smart watch and I couldn’t be happier about it. I did my research. I didn’t just buy it, and obviously I didn’t jump onto the bandwagon immediately after they first started coming out. It took years. I thought that it would be sort of useless for me to get one.
